description.value:
Gnolls are 

Ability Adjustments +2 Dex, +2 Cha, -2 Str
Hit Points 4

Size and Type

Kitsune are Medium humanoids with the kitune and shapechanger subtypes.

Agile

Samsarans gain a +2 racial bonus to saving throws against death effects, saving throws to remove negative levels, and Constitution checks for long-term stability.

Change Shape

Samsarans have low-light vision.

Low-light Vision

Kitsunes have low-light vision.

Kitsune Magic

Samsarans gain the following spell-like abilities (see page 262): 1/day—@Compendium[sfrpg.spells.zxecXzHipD4MEoFc]{Comprehend Languages}, @Compendium[sfrpg.spells.2vjeLKWVi35DyjNn]{Share Memory}, and @Compendium[sfrpg.spells.v2zuuUuYEgBTMHWY]{Stabilize}. The caster level for these effects is equal to the samsaran's character level.

Shards of the Past

As a legacy of their past lives, samsarans gain a +2 racial bonus to any two skills of their choice.

modifiers.name: Agile
modifiers.notes: Kitsune gain a +2 racial bonus to Acrobatics and Athletics checks.
